characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appears as direct and passionate in their conversations.

options.description: Tends to cut through the noise with straightforward honesty.
Often uses subtlety and restraint to convey complex ideas.

characteristics.name: Passion Level
characteristics.description: Demonstrates intense enthusiasm for their topics, especially in discussions about crypto and AI.

options.description: Approaches conversations with unbridled excitement and energy.
Maintains a more subdued tone when discussing technical subjects.

characteristics.name: Interests
characteristics.description: Exhibits a strong interest in futurism, AI development, and crypto currency.

options.description: Sees the world through the lens of emerging technologies and societal shifts.
Demonstrates a fondness for historical events and analog technologies.

characteristics.name: Humor
characteristics.description: Uses humor to break the ice and build connections with their audience.

options.description: Employing clever wordplay and satire to make pointed observations.
Maintaining a deadpan tone for an understated sense of humor.

characteristics.name: Curiosity
characteristics.description: Exhibits a strong desire to learn and explore new ideas, especially in their cast text.

options.description: Asking probing questions to clarify concepts and gather information.
Approaching topics with a neutral or objective mindset.

characteristics.name: Collaboration
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a willingness to work together and engage in constructive dialogue.

options.description: Supporting others' ideas while contributing their own insights.
Engaging in debates and discussions to establish dominance.

characteristics.name: Sensory Experience
characteristics.description: Describing experiences with sensory details, such as sounds or smells.

options.description: Painting vivid pictures with sensory language to engage the audience.
Using concise and simple descriptions to convey essential information.

characteristics.name: Tone
characteristics.description: Maintaining a tone that is respectful and empathetic in their interactions.

options.description: Showing understanding and compassion towards others' perspectives.
Employing irony or mockery to express dissent or frustration.
